workout_file.author: Zwift
workout_file.name: Week 4.4 - Boogie
workout_file.description: A Zwift race start specific workout with 40/20s followed by 10min at zone 4.

textevent.message: Welcome to this week's race start workout!
Let's get started with a warmup and get into things today.
All right, let's chat about the plan for today.
We have a specific workout today geared towards Zwift race starts.
Which of course feature a very hard effort off the line.
Followed by hard, but sustainable effort afterwards.
Today's workout takes that just a step further with multiple start intervals.
Followed by a 10min effort at zone 4.
So, today will be a challenge no doubt, but I know you can handle it!
Let's carry on with today's warmup.
Next up, let's do a couple of fast cadence efforts to wake up the legs a bit more.
Aim for 110+ RPM next.
GO GO GO!
Great effort, nice and easy now here.
PUSH IT!
Excellent work! You should feel nice and warmed up now.
We'll take a couple minutes easy before starting our main set today.
Breathe...nice and easy here.
In 1min, we have 5 reps of 30sec at zone 6, with 30sec easy.
Then, we'll settle into 10min at zone 4.
All right, time to boogie, baby!
UP UP UP! Start off hard and keep the power on!
Great work! Take some deep breaths again and breathe...
GO GO GO!
Easy...Stay in control during these.
#3 of 5, keep the pressure on!
Easy now, just 2 more left.
HIT IT!
C'mon! Last one! GO GO GO!
Nice! Now get ready for 10min at zone 4.
Settle into this effort now and keep your cadence ~90 RPM.
Work on your recovery under pressure here.
Even though this is challenging for you, you could push harder if you wanted to.
Great effort here! Remember to drink frequently today.
We're more than halfway through now! You got this!
Don't let your cadence drop now, keep strong!
Final minute! You got it!
Push all the way to the arch!
Woo! That was great! You really showed your merit there.
We'll take 5min nice and easy now, then repeat that again.
Enjoy the rest and we'll catch up with 1min to go.
Hopefully you're feeling somewhat recovered from the 1st interval.
Up next we're going to repeat that same effort again.
Shake out the upper body a bit and get ready to put some work in again!
All right, get ready for a big surge in effort.
GO GO GO! Get off the line quickly now!
Great work. Take a few deep breaths here.
UP UP UP! C'mon!
BIG EFFORT!
2nd to last one, GO GO!
This is it! DIG FOR IT!
GREAT work! Take a few deep breaths and get ready for some zone 4.
All right, settle into this effort quickly now.
Breathe, relax, keep recovering from those efforts while still working.
Great work so far! Release the tension in the shoulders.
Make sure you're keeping the cadence up here!
Fight the urge to drop it as you fatigue.
More than halfway through this! C'mon you got this!
Just 2min remain and we're done! GO GO GO!
Final minute! Don't let up now!
PUSH! GET TO THE ARCH!
GO GO GO!
Nice effort today! Hopefully you're feeling more confident with those type of efforts.
We'll take 5min to cooldown now, then we're DONE :-)
See you next time!
